title: Garden Level 1BR 1BA ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED DW COIN-OP 1CAR 8/1
posting_body: Rent Includes:: Electricity, Gas, Heat, Hot Water
PLEASE CALL 781-962-6615 WITH QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING.
VIEWINGS CAN NOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT.
Garden Level 1 bedroom unit features a spacious eat-in, fully applianced kitchen with dishwasher, disposal, gas range, and refrigerator.
There is a spacious living room with a working fireplace, a full tiled bath, and 1 bedroom.
There is an overabundance of closet spaces as well as access to a coin-operated washer and dryer.
This unit has its own private entrance.
Heat and electricity are included in the monthly rent.
This property is located in Arlington Heights near the Lexington line and there is easy access to public transportation and rt 2/128/90.
Close to Trader Joe's and all that Arlington Heights has to offer.
Sorry, no pets, and smoking is not permitted inside the unit.
Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
Photos of managed buildings may be representative only and not of the actual unit available.
